title: 80/114. Credentials of representatives to the eightieth session of the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/80/114 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
16 December 2025 
 
25-20552 (E) 
*2520552* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 3 (b) 
Credentials of representatives to the eightieth session of the 
General Assembly: report of the Credentials Committee 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 12 December 2025 
 
 
 
 
[without reference to a Main Committee (A/80/547, para. 17)] 
 
 
 
80/114. Credentials of representatives to the eightieth session of the 
General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Having considered the report of the Credentials Committee and the 
recommendation contained therein, 
 
Approves the report of the Credentials Committee.1 
 
61st plenary meeting 
12 December 2025 
 
__________________ 
 
1 A/80/547.
